item.title: 中国的 "长期低价 "承诺让债券陷入未知数
item.description: 中国 11 万亿美元的政府债券市场已进入未知领域，因为新时期的货币政策引发了关于收益率将从历史低点进一步下降多少的争论。【原文：China’s $11 trillion government bond market has moved into uncharted territory as a new era of monetary policy opens up debate over how much further yields will fall from record lows.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将购买 9 亿欧元桑坦德抵押贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根士丹利即将达成协议，从桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）购买约 9 亿欧元（约合 9.4 亿美元）的西班牙抵押贷款。【原文：Morgan Stanley is close to an agreement to buy around €900 million ($940 million) in Spanish mortgages from Banco Santander SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Seplat 将重启埃克森公司数百口闲置的尼日利亚老油井
item.description: Seplat Energy Plc 完成收购埃克森美孚公司在西非国家的陆上石油和天然气资产后，将重启数百口闲置的尼日利亚油井。【原文：Seplat Energy Plc will revive hundreds of idle Nigerian oil wells after completing its purchase of Exxon Mobil Corp.’s onshore oil and gas assets in the West African nation.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克称必要时可能大幅降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克表示，如果经济发展需要，可以扩大降息规模。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said the size of interest-rate reductions could be increased should economic developments warrant it.】

item.title: 中国煤炭价格跌至年内低点，经济刺激政策令人失望
item.description: 由于政府提振经济的努力未能重振疲软的需求，为数百万家庭和工厂提供电力的中国主要燃料价格创下了一年多来的最低水平。【原文：The price of China’s mainstay fuel, powering millions of homes and factories, has hit the lowest level in over a year, as the government’s efforts to boost the economy fail to revive tepid demand.】

item.title: 南非自 2022 年以来首次实现市场外资净流入
item.description: 南非报告称，在致力于促进经济增长的联合政府的鼓励下，外国投资者自 2022 年以来首次净流入其债务和股票市场。【原文：South Africa reported the first net inflows by foreign investors to its debt and equity markets since 2022, encouraged by a coalition government committed to boosting economic growth.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦认为在利率不再受限之前将有更多降息举措
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行将在 2025 年进一步降低借贷成本，距离货币政策不再具有限制性还有一段路要走。【原文：The European Central Bank will lower borrowing costs further in 2025 and there is some way to go before monetary policy stops being restrictive, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 印尼盾跌破 1 美元兑 16000 印尼盾的关键水平
item.description: 印尼盾跌破了 1 美元兑 16,000 印尼盾的关键心理价位，这给印尼央行施加了更大的压力，迫使其加强对印尼盾的保护。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah dropped past the key psychological level of 16,000 per dollar, escalating pressure on the central bank to ramp up its defense of the currency.】

item.title: 英国经济在第四季度初意外萎缩
item.description: 英国经济在 10 月份连续第二个月出现萎缩，原因是消费者要为痛苦的预算做准备，这延续了首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的工党新政府令人失望的增长数字。【原文：Britain’s economy contracted for a second straight month in October as consumers braced for a painful budget, extending a disappointing run of growth figures under Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s new Labour government.】

item.title: 欧洲股市将在华尔街阴影下再战一年
item.description: 欧洲股票多头希望明年该地区的股票能缩小与美国股票高回报的差距，但他们注定要失望了。【原文：European stock bulls looking for the region’s equities to close the gap on superior returns in the US next year are set for disappointment.】

item.title: 澳大利亚移民人数两年来首次下降
item.description: 周五的官方数据显示，自澳大利亚取消科维德时代的边境限制以来，移民澳大利亚的人数首次出现下降，主要原因是留学生人数的下降。【原文：The number of people migrating to Australia fell for the first time since the country lifted its Covid-era border restrictions, led by a drop in international student arrivals, official figures showed Friday.】

item.title: 欧洲要么努力工作，要么面临几乎无增长的局面
item.description: 据美国经济咨商局（The Conference Board）称，除非欧洲领导人开始着手改革，并为私人投资的大幅增长创造条件，否则欧洲将面临严峻的经济前景。【原文：Europe faces dire economic prospects unless its leaders start tackling reforms and put the conditions in place for a significant increase in private investment, according to The Conference Board.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在 10 月 GDP 数据公布前走软
据说凯雷正在孟买酝酿对 Quest Global 进行 10 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is considering an initial public offering of engineering services firm Quest Global Services Pte in India, people familiar with the matter said, amid increasing investor interest in the nation’s stock market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒称欧洲经济复苏预计缓慢
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒认为，欧洲经济复苏将十分缓慢。【原文：Europe’s economic recovery will be slow, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller.】

item.title: 慕尼黑再保险公司凭借 "运营业绩 "实现 60 亿欧元利润目标
item.description: 慕尼黑再保险公司的目标是明年净收入达到 60 亿欧元（63 亿美元），因为它预计将受益于 "所有业务部门的良好运营表现"。【原文：Munich Re is targeting net income of €6 billion ($6.3 billion) next year as it expects to benefit from “good operational performance in all business segments.”】

item.title: SoftwareOne 就收购挪威 Crayon 集团进行深入谈判
item.description: SoftwareOne AG 证实，该公司正在就收购 Crayon Group Holding A/S 进行深入讨论，这项潜在交易将扩大两家软件公司在欧洲的业务范围。【原文：SoftwareOne AG affirmed it’s in advanced discussions to take over Crayon Group Holding A/S, a potential deal that will expand the software companies’ reach across Europe.】

item.title: 瑞银集团的 Baweja 认为中国被低估了印度股市繁荣的风险
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席策略师巴努-巴维加（Bhanu Baweja）认为，印度的股票多头们没有充分认识到中美贸易紧张局势升级给印度蓬勃发展的市场带来的风险。【原文：India’s stock bulls are under-appreciating the risks to the nation’s booming market from any escalation in US-China trade tensions, according to UBS Group AG’s Chief Strategist Bhanu Baweja.】

item.title: 变压器供应紧张促使土耳其 Astor 公司向国外扩张
item.description: 土耳其变压器制造商 Astor Transformator Enerji 计划在西班牙和美国开设首家海外工厂，以帮助解决全球能源转型关键设备短缺的问题。【原文：Turkish transformer maker Astor Transformator Enerji plans to open its first factories abroad, in Spain and the US, to help address a global shortage of the devices that are key to the energy transition.】

item.title: 特朗普眼中的世界已经到来
item.description:
央行正在采取零和行动，我们可以预见，未来四年内央行还会采取更多行动。【原文：

Central banks are making zero-sum moves, and we can expect a lot more during the next four years.

】

item.title: Grifols 的 "恐怖年 "让分析师和卖空者意见不一
item.description: 西班牙制药商 Grifols SA 即将迎来有史以来最糟糕的一年，但一些分析师还不准备放弃这只一直是做空者最爱攻击目标的股票。【原文：Spanish drugmaker Grifols SA is poised for its worst year on record, but some analysts aren’t ready yet to give up on a stock that’s been a favorite target of short sellers.】

item.title: Pimco 和 Fidelity 认为欧洲央行有可能比市场预期做出更多削减
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. and Fidelity International are among investors who say the darkening economic outlook in Europe may force policymakers to cut interest rates more than the market expects.】

item.title: 印尼银行采取 "相当大胆 "的干预措施支撑印尼盾
item.description: 印尼盾兑美元汇率触及四个月低点并逼近16,000的关键水平，印尼央行周五加大了对市场的干预力度。【原文：Bank Indonesia intervened more aggressively in the market on Friday as the rupiah touched a four-month low and approached the key level of 16,000 against the dollar.】

item.title: 据说麦格理将竞购 Axiata 的电信基础设施部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management Pty）已经提交了一份竞购Axiata Group Bhd.电信基础设施部门的报价，交易价值约为35亿美元。【原文：Macquarie Asset Management Pty has submitted a bid to buy Axiata Group Bhd.’s telecom infrastructure unit in a transaction that could value it at about $3.5 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 韩国股市将收复戒严令惨败造成的损失
item.description: 韩国股票基准周五攀升，将收复因总统尹锡烈实施戒严令失败而引发的损失。【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark climbed on Friday, set to recover losses triggered by President Yoon Suk Yeol’s failed bid to impose martial law.】

item.title: CD Projekt 公布《巫师 4》新女主角人选
item.description:
在这款备受期待的游戏中，原主角的养女 Ciri 将登场

。【原文：

The hotly anticipated game will feature Ciri, the adopted daugher of the original lead character

】

item.title: 韩国财政部长寻求让信用评级公司放心
item.description: 韩国财政部长致电主要信用评级公司的全球主权评级负责人，就韩国政治动荡可能造成的影响向他们作出保证。【原文：South Korea’s finance minister called the global heads of sovereign coverage at major credit rating firms to reassure them over the possible impact of the nation’s political turmoil.】

item.title: 中国持续通货紧缩对世界意味着什么？
item.description: 事实证明，中国陷入通货紧缩的漩涡难以收拾。这个世界第二大经济体的物价已连续六个季度下跌，如果再下跌一个季度，将创下上世纪 90 年代末亚洲金融危机时的通货紧缩纪录。【原文：China’s spiral into deflation is proving hard to fix. Prices in the world’s second-biggest economy have fallen for six consecutive quarters, and if they fall for one more quarter, the run would equal a record deflationary streak set in the Asian Financial Crisis in the late 1990s.】

item.title: 消费者通胀数据公布后，印度债券牛市略有回升
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 马斯克致信美国证券交易委员会披露 Neuralink 调查情况，加剧了双方的争执
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四再次与美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）结怨，他在信中称，该机构正在调查他的脑机接口公司 Neuralink Corp.【原文：Elon Musk renewed his longstanding feud with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday by posting a letter that said the agency is investigating his brain-computer interface company, Neuralink Corp.】
